#summary OBO Foundry Operations Committee Editorial WG

= Introduction =

This page describes members and activities of the OBOFOC Editorial WG.


= Details =

The OBOFOC Editorial Working Group is involved in reviewing OBO Foundry ontologies and policy setting. Primary tasks are to conduct reviews, but also include all activities that enable that process, such as tool building for automated validation, website maintenance of the review results, or leading calls and taking notes.
